story.text: Jan 3 Navigational device maker Garmin Ltd. (GRMN.O) said it acquired the exclusive distributor of its consumer products in France and expects the deal to add to its earnings in 2007. Following the deal, EME Tec Sat SAS will change its name to Garmin France SAS and will retain its management, sales, marketing and supporting staff. (Reporting by Ankur Relia in Bangalore)
story.title: garmin buys french distributor , sees deal adding to 2007 earns
